column1: How can Notes be useful for my Page?
column2: The Notes App for your Page gives you a publishing tool (just like a blog). Notes allow you to generate content for your Page to share more information and connect with your audience. For every Note that you create for your Page, you can have a main photo, and an album of the Note.

column1: How many Notes can I write for my Page?
column2: There is no limit on the number of Notes that you can create for your Page. You can create any number of Notes for your Page.

column1: How can I write a Note on my Page?
column2:
You can write Notes on your Page in one of the following ways:  
1. To write a Note, please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the Page Profile.
b. Click “Notes” tab on the Page Profile. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Notes”.
c. Click on “Write a Note” link from the top left corner of the “Notes” tab.
d. Fill up the form to write a note. To make your Page Note attractive, use the WYSIWYG editor and upload a suitable image.
e. Now, when you’re done with filling up the form, select the status to “Published” for publishing the Note and to generate the feeds of note creation to update your Page fans.

2. From the “Apps” section of your Page Dashboard, click on the “Write a Note” button and follow the steps from ‘d’ to ‘e’ as in case 1 above.

column1: Who all can write Notes on my Page?
column2: You can choose who all can write Notes for your Page while creating your Page, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Notes Creation Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Page Details” link for your Page.

column1: I want to search for a specific Page Note. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a Page Note using the detailed search box available in the “Notes” section under Page navigation.

column1: What are Sponsored Page Notes? How can Notes created on my Page be made Sponsored?
column2:
Sponsored Page Notes are those Notes which have been created for Paid Pages. These Sponsored Notes will appear in the “Sponsored Notes” block in the “Notes” section under Page navigation. On “Browse Notes” for Page Notes and in search results, they are marked with a “Sponsored” marker. The search form for Page Notes also has a quick filter for seeing Sponsored Notes.
If your Page is created under a Paid Package, then the Notes created for it would automatically be made Sponsored. The availability of Paid Page Packages on our site is conditional depending on the settings configured by our site administrators.

column1: What are Featured Page Notes? Who can mark Notes for Pages as Featured?
column2:
Featured Page Notes are notes of Pages which are specially marked as “Featured”. Such notes are more highlighted than others and thus gain more visibility. Featured Page Notes appear in the “Featured Notes” slideshow in the “Notes” section under Page navigation. On “Browse Notes” for Page Notes and in search results, they are marked with a “Featured” marker. The search form for Page Notes also has a quick filter for seeing Featured Notes.
Page Notes can be made Featured only by our site administrators.

column1: I have a Page on this site. However, the Notes feature is not available for my Page. What could be the reason?
column2:
The reason why Notes feature is not available for your Page could be that, you might have chosen a Package for your Page for which the Notes App is not available. In this case, you can see if choosing a different Package with the Notes App suits you. You can change the Package for your Page from the “Packages” section of your Page Dashboard.
Availability of Packages for Pages, and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
